author: Lynette Rice
title: Outlander's Sam Heughan reveals six years of bullying and harassment in shocking Instagram post
description: 'Outlander' star Sam Heughan posted a lengthy statement on Instagram late Thursday detailing "six years of constant bullying, harassment, stalking and false narrative."
content: Outlander star Sam Heughan posted a lengthy statement on his Instagram story and Twitter late Thursday detailing "six years of constant bullying, harassment, stalking and false narrative" – his most candid revelation about stardom since joining the Starz dram… [+2513 chars]
